reviews.text: I left my bag on a train and the staff were absolutely wonderful helping me locate it.  They could not have done more, especially on a busy friday night.
Really clean Station                                                                                                                    Thameslink , London Overground and Southern Services on track.

Brilliant connections - 12 mins to London Bridge, 18 to Blackfriars, 27 direct to Kings Cross.

Staff are great - the station attendant with the gold earring even helps me carry my child’s buggy up and down the steps. Unfortunately no step-free access yet. But helpful staff make the situation better!

The station has incredible access to central London, 12 mins from zone 4 and theoretically is a good service. Unfortunately it is run by staff who appear incompetent; they change the platforms for your train without allowing enough time for passengers to walk to the other platform (possibly they are bored and playing a game), it’s infuriating for those who are stable on their feet and impossible for those who are more infirm)
